results.content:
As far as I see, he is not being felt responsible to teach anyone in this course. He is not showing, not telling the tricks. All things the can do is Copy & Paste. This is a disaster course. First time in my life I had such a course. 

This course is here for `Easy passive income`. Any mid developer can do this course in 1 day. there is no effort.. he is not deserving to be here as a teacher.
